mapper.insert:
insert into training_recode (part_name, training_name, weight, rep, create_date) values
( #{trainingRecord.part_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingRecord.training_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingRecord.weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingRecord.rep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingRecord.create_date,jdbcType=DATE} )
